item.title: What we know about Jimmy Carter’s funeral plans
item.description: President Joe Biden said he has started the process to hold a state funeral, and the Carter Center said the body will lie in state.

item.title: How Jimmy Carter redefined his legacy
item.description: Former president Jimmy Carter has died at the age of 100. The 39th president served one term and went on to lead an extraordinary life after the White...

item.title: Trump endorses Mike Johnson for reelection as House speaker ahead of perilous vote
item.description: House Republicans have said for weeks that Donald Trump would have the final say on whether Johnson keeps the gavel or is replaced.

item.title: Jimmy Carter’s death prompts condolences, praise around the world
item.description: Praise was widespread for Carter’s human rights activism, conflict-resolution work and kindness during his presidency and the following decades.

item.title: Tracking Biden administration political appointees to fill top roles
item.description: Follow the president's progress filling nearly 800 positions, among the 1,200 that require Senate confirmation, in this tracker from The Washington Po...
